entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
